title: Propulsion Assignment
description:
The assignment is available online.

Submit a link to the landing page of your Web application running on Netlify.

The landing page should include the following:
• Your full name and section
• Links to each of the lab assignments
• Link to the Kanbas application
• Links to all relevant source code repositories

The Kanbas application should include a link to navigate back to the landing page.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Analyze combustion chamber performance and submit your findings.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design a nozzle for a rocket engine and submit your project report.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Complete the aerodynamics quiz covering fluid dynamics and lift principles.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Perform a flow analysis on the provided airfoil data and submit your report.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Analyze aerodynamic heating effects during re-entry and submit calculations.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Design a structural component for a spacecraft and submit your analysis.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital parameters for the given mission profile and submit results.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Complete the systems engineering exam covering integration and testing.
